text: @seanhannity Can you PLEASE expose that the ratial disparity in COVID19 is due to low Vit D3 in people of color due to melanin in the skin acting as sunscreen!  Known for DECADES and accounts for most health discrepancies...please diffuse this asinine 'ratial targeting' narrative!
